mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_CD as employeeCode ,SHOP_CD as shopCode ,EMPLOYEE_PW as employeePw ,EMPLOYEE_NM as employeeName ,EMPLOYEE_BIRTH_DT as employeeBirthDate ,EMPLOYEE_ADDR as employeeAddr ,EMPLOYEE_PHONE_NO as employeePhoneNo ,EMPLOYEE_CELLPHONE_NO as employeeCellPhoneNo ,EMPLOYEE_JOIN_DT as employeeJoinDate ,EMPLOYEE_MEMO as employeeMemo ,EMPLOYEE_LEVEL_NM as employeeLevelName FROM CRM_EMPLOYEE_TB WHERE EMPLOYEE_CD=#{employeeCode}
